gods_and_mages_engine.Quests

Class CollectQuest

  • java.lang.Object
    • gods_and_mages_engine.Quests.BaseQuest
      • gods_and_mages_engine.Quests.CollectQuest

  • public class CollectQuest
extends BaseQuest
    Used to define quests whose completion involves collecting a specified item.

    • Method Detail

      • completeQuest

        public void completeQuest()
        Handles results of quest completion.

        Implementing classes override this method to handle any aspects unique to the appropriate quest type, then call the super class method to handle the shared aspects.

        Removes itemAmount of targetItem from player character's inventory

        Overrides:
        completeQuest in class BaseQuest

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete()
        Checks amount of targetItem in player character's inventory against itemAmount.
        Specified by:
        isComplete in class BaseQuest
        Returns:
        true if PlayerCharacter.checkItemQuantity(java.lang.String) greater than or equal to itemAmount
